 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָבַל‎</span>] **verb** ==bind, pledge== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bind***; compare Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***travail***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲבַל‎</span> ***pledge*** (but rare and dubious); especially <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cord, field***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַבְלָא‎</span> ***cord***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶבְלָא‎</span> ***pain***, especially of travail; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חבל‎</span> ***border-territory***, or ***field***, [[BDB#SabDenkm|SabDenkm]]<sup>48.49</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Zim|Zim]]<sup>BP 93 n.</sup>, compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***na—balu***</u></abbr>, ***rope***, ***snare*** (but <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—***</u></abbr> = <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">)) — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָבָ֑ל‎</span> [[Ezek.18.16|Ezek 18:16]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַחֲבֹל‎</span> [[Deut.24.6|Deut 24:6]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחֲבֹל‎</span> [[Deut.24.17|Deut 24:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְבֹּל‎</span> [[Ezek.22.25|Ezek 22:25]]; [[Job.22.6|Job 22:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַחְבְּלוּ‎</span> [[Job.24.3|Job 24:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַחְבֹּ֑לוּ‎</span> [[Job.24.9|Job 24:9]] ***Imperative*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַבְלֵהוּ‎</span> [[Prov.20.16|Prov 20:16]]; [[Prov.27.13|Prov 27:13]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָבֹל‎</span> [[Exod.22.25|Exod 22:25]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹבֵל‎</span> [[Deut.24.6|Deut 24:6]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹבְלִים‎</span> [[Zech.11.7|Zech 11:7]]; [[Zech.11.14|Zech 11:14]] (name of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַקֵּל‎</span>); ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲבֻלִים‎</span> [[Amos.2.8|Amos 2:8]] — 

**1.** ***bind***, only in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹבְלִים‎</span>, name of one of Zechariah's symbolic staves, [[Zech.11.7|Zech 11:7]]; [[Zech.11.14|Zech 11:14]] symbolic of fraternity. Especially 

**2.** ***bind*** by taking a pledge of, ***hold by a pledge***, followed by accusative of person [[Prov.20.16|Prov 20:16]]; [[Prov.27.13|Prov 27:13]]; [[Job.22.6|Job 22:6]] ***take*** or ***hold in pledge***, followed by accusative of thing [[Exod.22.25|Exod 22:25]] ( [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]), [[Deut.24.6|Deut 24:6]] (twice in verse); [[Deut.24.17|Deut 24:17]]; [[Job.24.3|Job 24:3]] followed by accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲבֹל‎</span> [[Ezek.18.16|Ezek 18:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלעָֿנִי יַחְבֹּ֑לוּ‎</span> [[Job.24.9|Job 24:9]] probably pregnant (see [[BDB#Di|Di]]) ***take pledges*** (getting power) ***over the poor***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּגָדִים חֲבֻלִים‎</span> [[Amos.2.8|Amos 2:8]] ***garments taken in pledge.*** **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵחָ֫בֶל לוֺ‎</span> [[Prov.13.13|Prov 13:13]] ***becometh pledged to it*** (i.e. pledged to pay the penalty, opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשֻׁלָּ֑ם‎</span>), so [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#Str|Str]] [[BDB#RV|RVm]] [[BDB#VB|VB]]. &gt; below II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָבַל‎</span> q. v. **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִבְּלָה‎</span> [[Song.8.5|Song 8:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִבְּלַתְךָ‎</span> [[Song.8.5|Song 8:5]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְחַבֶּלֿ‎</span> [[Ps.7.15|Ps 7:15]] — ***writhe, twist***, hence ***travail***; of mother [[Song.8.5|Song 8:5]] (twice in verse) (with accusative of child; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְלָדָ֑תְךָ‎</span>); metaphor of wicked man <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְחַבֶּלאָֿ֑וֶן וְהָרָה עָמָל וְיָלַד שָֽׁקֶר ׃‎</span> [[Ps.7.15|Ps 7:15]]. 



 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָבַל‎</span> **verb** ==act (ruinously) corruptly== (Late Hebrew ***id. wound, injure***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***corrupt*** or ***render unsound*** (the mind, a limb, etc.), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be deranged*** (in mind); Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—abâlu***</u></abbr>, ***injure***, VR<sup>62, 11</sup>; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַבֵּל‎</span> ***corrupt, ruin***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be arrogant, audacious***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֿבל‎</span> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Epigr. Denkm. 48</sup>; compare Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חבל‎</span> ***mortuus*** [[BDB#Vog|Vog]]<sup>No. 161</sup> and often) — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָבַלְנוּ‎</span> [[Neh.1.7|Neh 1:7]] ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶחְבֹּל‎</span> [[Job.34.31|Job 34:31]] ***Infinitive construct*** (used as ***absolute***) [[Neh.1.7|Neh 1:7]] — ***act corruptly*** against, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲבֹל חבלנו לְ‎</span> [[Neh.1.7|Neh 1:7]] absolute [[Job.34.31|Job 34:31]]. **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵחָ֫בֶל לוֺ‎</span> [[Prov.13.13|Prov 13:13]] ***shall be ruined*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> reflexive), [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Ges|Rob-Ges]] [[BDB#AV|AV]] [[BDB#RV|RV]], but &lt; I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָבַל‎</span> (q. v.) **Pi\`el** ***ruin, destroy: Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְחִבֵּל את מעשׂה ידיך‎</span> [[Eccl.5.5|Eccl 5:5]], subject God. ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּחַבֵּל וְחֶבֶל נִמְרָץ‎</span> [[Mic.2.10|Mic 2:10]] ***that destroyeth***, even with sore destruction; but read rather <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּחֻבְּלוּ ח‎</span> ***ye shall be destroyed with*** etc., so [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Roo|Roo]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]. ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְחַבֵּל‎</span> with accusative, the poor [[Isa.32.7|Isa 32:7]], the land [[Isa.13.5|Isa 13:5]] absolute [[Isa.54.16|Isa 54:16]] compare ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְחַבְּלִים‎</span> [[Song.2.15|Song 2:15]] with accusative of foxes ruining vineyards. **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְחֻבַּל‎</span> consecutive [[Isa.10.27|Isa 10:27]] of yoke, ***be ruined, broken***, si vera lectio; [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>JPh xiii. 1885, p. 62</sup> proposes <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יחדל‎</span>, compare also [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>critical note</sup>.; and remark by [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]; 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֻבָּ֑לָה‎</span> [[Job.17.1|Job 17:1]] ***my spirit is broken*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָמַי נִזְעָ֑כוּ‎</span>); ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּחֻבְּלוּ‎</span> [[Mic.2.10|Mic 2:10]] (emendation: see above)
